scripts.android:build:abhiyan:uat: cross-env APP_ENV=uat BRAND=abhiyan node ./scripts/gradleBuild.js android assembleRelease
scripts.android:build:abhiyan:demo: cross-env APP_ENV=demo BRAND=abhiyan node ./scripts/gradleBuild.js android assembleRelease
scripts.android:build:rajyog:uat: cross-env APP_ENV=uat BRAND=rajyog node ./scripts/gradleBuild.js android assembleRelease
scripts.android:build:rajyog:demo: cross-env APP_ENV=demo BRAND=rajyog node ./scripts/gradleBuild.js android assembleRelease
scripts.docker:dev:build:abhiyan: BRAND=abhiyan docker compose -f docker-compose.yml --profile dev build --no-cache
scripts.docker:dev:up:abhiyan: BRAND=abhiyan docker compose -f docker-compose.yml --profile dev up -d
scripts.docker:dev:restart:abhiyan: npm run docker:dev:down:abhiyan && npm run docker:dev:up:abhiyan
scripts.docker:dev:build:rajyog: BRAND=rajyog docker compose -f docker-compose.yml --profile dev build --no-cache
scripts.docker:dev:up:rajyog: BRAND=rajyog docker compose -f docker-compose.yml --profile dev up -d
scripts.docker:dev:restart:rajyog: npm run docker:dev:down:rajyog && npm run docker:dev:up:rajyog
scripts.docker:uat:build:abhiyan: BRAND=abhiyan docker compose -f docker-compose.yml --profile uat build --no-cache
scripts.docker:uat:up:abhiyan: BRAND=abhiyan docker compose -f docker-compose.yml --profile uat up -d
scripts.docker:uat:restart:abhiyan: npm run docker:uat:down:abhiyan && npm run docker:uat:up:abhiyan
scripts.docker:uat:build:rajyog: BRAND=rajyog docker compose -f docker-compose.yml --profile uat build --no-cache
scripts.docker:uat:up:rajyog: BRAND=rajyog docker compose -f docker-compose.yml --profile uat up -d
scripts.docker:uat:restart:rajyog: npm run docker:uat:down:rajyog && npm run docker:uat:up:rajyog
scripts.docker:demo:build:abhiyan: BRAND=abhiyan docker compose -f docker-compose.yml --profile demo build --no-cache
scripts.docker:demo:up:abhiyan: BRAND=abhiyan docker compose -f docker-compose.yml --profile demo up -d
scripts.docker:demo:restart:abhiyan: npm run docker:demo:down:abhiyan && npm run docker:demo:up:abhiyan
scripts.docker:demo:build:rajyog: BRAND=rajyog docker compose -f docker-compose.yml --profile demo build --no-cache
scripts.docker:demo:up:rajyog: BRAND=rajyog docker compose -f docker-compose.yml --profile demo up -d
scripts.docker:demo:restart:rajyog: npm run docker:demo:down:rajyog && npm run docker:demo:up:rajyog
scripts.docker:prod:restart: npm run docker:prod:down && npm run docker:prod:up
scripts.docker:build:tar:dev:abhiyan: node ./scripts/createTarDir.js && BRAND=abhiyan docker compose -f docker-compose.yml --profile dev build --no-cache && docker save -o tar/abhiyan_ai_frontend_dev_abhiyan.tar abhiyan_ai_frontend:latest
scripts.docker:build:tar:dev:rajyog: node ./scripts/createTarDir.js && BRAND=rajyog docker compose -f docker-compose.yml --profile dev build --no-cache && docker save -o tar/abhiyan_ai_frontend_dev_rajyog.tar abhiyan_ai_frontend:latest
scripts.docker:build:tar:uat:abhiyan: node ./scripts/createTarDir.js && BRAND=abhiyan docker compose -f docker-compose.yml --profile uat build --no-cache && docker save -o tar/abhiyan_ai_frontend_uat_abhiyan.tar abhiyan_ai_frontend:latest
scripts.docker:build:tar:uat:rajyog: node ./scripts/createTarDir.js && BRAND=rajyog docker compose -f docker-compose.yml --profile uat build --no-cache && docker save -o tar/abhiyan_ai_frontend_uat_rajyog.tar abhiyan_ai_frontend:latest
scripts.docker:build:tar:demo:abhiyan: node ./scripts/createTarDir.js && BRAND=abhiyan docker compose -f docker-compose.yml --profile demo build --no-cache && docker save -o tar/abhiyan_ai_frontend_demo_abhiyan.tar abhiyan_ai_frontend:latest
scripts.docker:build:tar:demo:rajyog: node ./scripts/createTarDir.js && BRAND=rajyog docker compose -f docker-compose.yml --profile demo build --no-cache && docker save -o tar/abhiyan_ai_frontend_demo_rajyog.tar abhiyan_ai_frontend:latest
